name: 80 Boxes
description:
We would like to introduce you to our first game 80 Boxes (80xes)

80 Boxes is a battle platform game with a retro style where defeating your enemies with boxes turns to be an art slightly violent and gory.

To know more please visit:

80 boxes web page

Currently the game is in alpha but we will update the game as we continue adding content, so do not worry once you have the game and purchased for more than 9.99USD you can upgrade for free (steam key too).

We are Greenlit!
